column5: I have had this gl3 in my basement for a few years now collecting dust.   I have a few float rods that i use but id like to get this old girl back in action.   The reason i guess i dont like it is becuase it dosn't have a fixed reel seat.   I was wondering if anyone could recommend a custom rod builder that would be able to put a custom handle on this rod for me?     Thanks, Buckster

Depends where you're loacted.  Angling Specialties can do it. They have 3 loactions, Mississauga, Woodbridge, and Kennedy and Steeles.   You may want to do it yourself. It's not that hard to do. Reel seat, Cork handle, Butt cap, epoxy, sand paper and about 30 minutes work.  Muddler
You could PM Spiel in this community and see if he has the time to do it.
Like Roy said...Spiel is the man for the job...
Thanks for the    Roy and Norm. Shoot me a PM Buckster.

In and around our area their isn't many options .... Tom @ AS is your best bet...he or should i say his wife does a great job and will have it back to you within a week... There not the cheapest in town, but AS is close by and will do a pristine job...
Yeah i have had some work done there before! We'll see what i can find.
